activity_days.label: Base Activity Days
activity_days.description: Number of days with at least 1 Base Mainnet transaction.

tx_count.label: Total Transactions
tx_count.description: All Base Mainnet transactions sent by this address.

defi_swaps.label: DeFi Swaps
defi_swaps.description: Number of swaps across major DEXes on Base.

liquidity_yield.label: DeFi Liquidity / Yield
liquidity_yield.description: Cumulative USD volume x days in LP, lending and staking positions on Base.

builder.label: Builder Score
builder.description: Talent Protocol Builder Score (0-100) mapped to Base Builder armor.

nft_mints.label: NFT Mints
nft_mints.description: Number of NFTs minted on Base (incoming mints to this address).

social.label: Social Score
social.description: Offchain social influence mapped to this address.

weapon.label: No Weapon
weapon.description: Has not touched DeFi swaps yet.

shield.label: No Shield
shield.description: No LP, lending or staking activity.

armor.label: No Armor
armor.description: Has not earned builder armor yet.

neck_medallion.label: No Medallion
neck_medallion.description: Has not minted NFTs on Base yet.
